Reviews.Title: Best buy
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Beautiful, compares to higher priced cameras. Does what most cameras would like to do. Excellent assortment of goodies.Buy the bundle.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All Items Include Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) -Factory Refurbished + <2> Tamron 70-300mm Lens (Nikon) + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <5> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <6> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Vivitar 62mm UV Glass Filter + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <14> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm VR DX AF-S (Black) with Tamron 70-300mm Zoom Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Tripod + 2 Lens Set + Accessory Kit (Refurbished by Nikon USA)
